title: Dark Angel Volume 1: The Path to Destiny
description: Kia Asamiya is an internationally-recognized modern master of sequential art, and Dark Angel is the finest work yet to spring from the mind and pen of this Renaissance man of the comics. Dark Angel is fantasy action at its best, a moving and breathtaking story of the dangerous journey to enlightenment of a young swordsman. Guided by his spirit helper, Kye, and by his own search for mastery of the arts of war, magic, and moral action. Dark meets mang powerful opponents and spiritual guides who will test him and help him achieve his desting as a Phantom Saint. Kia Asamiya is the creator of Martian Successor Nadestice. Silent Moebius, and Steam Detectives, and the artist of Star Wars Episode One: The Phantom Menace.
author: Kia Asamiya
